results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በዚያ ቀን መነዳቱ ወደ ጌታህ (ፍርድ) ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የምትጠላውን ነገር (አላህ) ያስከትልህ፡፡ ለአንተ ተገቢህም ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም ጥፋት ይጠጋህ ለአንተ የተገባህም ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
